10-26.title: ONE ULTIMATE AUTHORITY
10-26.quote: For our group purpose there is but one ultimate authority â€” a loving God as He may express Himself in our group conscience.
10-26.source: TWELVE STEPS AND TWELVE TRADITIONS, p. 132
content: When I am chosen to carry some small responsibility for my fellows, I ask that God grant me the patience, open-mindedness, and willingness to listen to those I would lead. I must remind myself that I am the trusted servant of others, not their "governor," "teacher," or "instructor." God guides my words and my actions, and my responsibility is to heed His suggestions. Trust is my watchword, I trust others who lead. In the Fellowship of A.A., I entrust God with the ultimate authority of "running the show."
